title: "NIH EXPORTER"
author: "Jay Hesselberth"
date: "3/7/2015"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)

projects %>%
  filter(fiscal.year >= 2000) %>%
  group_by(fiscal.year, study.section, institute) %>%
  filter(!is.na(total.cost)) %>%
  summarize(count = n(), year.cost = sum(total.cost)) %>%
  arrange(desc(count)) %>%
  head(50) %>%
  kable()
```
